text: Abbas Zandi (; 3 June 1930 - 30 October 2017) was an Iranian Freestyle Wrestler, national champion, and coach. He was born in Tehran. Zandi had competed in three Olympic games including 1948 London, 1952 Helsinki and 1956 Melbourne. Zandi died on 30 October 2017 in Tehran at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Olympians for Iran Category:Iranian wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Tehran
title: Abbas Zandi
